# Copilot Instructions

This is a cross-platform hybrid web app project built with React and TypeScript.

## Project Structure

- **web**: React web application
- **mobile**: React Native mobile app (iOS/Android)
- **shared**: Shared libraries and utilities

## Setup

Follow the checklist items below to complete the project setup.

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [ ] Scaffold the React + TypeScript project
- [ ] Customize for cross-platform support
- [ ] Install required extensions (if any)
- [ ] Compile and test the project
- [ ] Create run/debug tasks
- [ ] Update final documentation
